comments:
Build 20030122

I have a perspective which keeps complaining as below for pretty much anything 
I am attempted to do in it (opening a new perspective in same window). It ends 
up being completely grey (with individual view borders ok, only contents are 
missing). I suspect I was able to multiselect several open perspective in left 
toolbar, and close them at once, ending up with some corruption.

Created an attachment (id=3157)
Dead perspective window

Had to exit and restart, since everything would die in previous session.
Tried to reproduce multi-selecting perspectives, but didn't succeed. 

However, I quickly seemed to run into troubles again, toolbars no longer redraw 
properly, see below stack traces:
